M17/6/MUSIC/BP1/ENG/TZ0/XX/SC




Music
Higher level and standard level


Thursday 11 May 2017 (morning)


                                 Score booklet

Instructions to candidates
yyDo not open this booklet until instructed to do so.
yyThis booklet contains the score required for the listening paper, section B.




                                                                                                2217 – 8003
     19 pages                                               © International Baccalaureate Organization 2017
                                              –2–              M17/6/MUSIC/BP1/ENG/TZ0/XX/SC

   Sinfonia in D (G.4) for trumpet, strings and continuo, Movement II (Presto and Adagio only)
                           and Movement III (Allegro) by Giuseppe Torelli

Movement II (Presto and Adagio)

                       Presto (   = 60)

    Trumpet in C




          Violin I




         Violin II




            Viola




      Violoncello




    Double Bass




     Harpsichord
